name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in **Python**, developing **Machine Learning** solutions, and building robust **Backend Systems** that meet high-performance criteria. My background includes designing and implementing **Data Pipelines** for efficient data processing and analysis. I possess a strong foundation in **Distributed Computing** and **High-Performance Computing**, allowing me to tackle complex challenges in dynamic environments.

My technical toolkit encompasses **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Flutter**, as well as frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. I have deep cloud experience working with **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms with integrated AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation.

I bring hands-on expertise in automated testing and code review practices, ensuring maintainable and aligned code quality. My commitment to effective communication and collaboration enhances team dynamics and project outcomes, while my proficiency in CI/CD automation aligns with compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, and SOC 2. Additionally, I have experience developing machine learning pipelines and serving models in production using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
